short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customized the new tab experience to show a calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension modifies the New Tab page to show the current time, your Google Calendar, and local weather information. It supports both a daily and weekly calendar view.
